Smart Clothes Hanger: Create a clothes hanger with a built-in sensor that can detect the weight of the clothes and adjust the angle of the hanger accordingly. This feature will help prevent overcrowding and wrinkles, and also provide real-time feedback on the weight of the clothes.

Virtual Try-On: Develop a clothes hanger with a built-in camera and augmented reality (AR) technology. Users can take a photo of themselves and virtually try on different outfits using the AR feature. This feature will help users save time and money by avoiding unnecessary purchases and ensuring a perfect fit.

Personalized Folding: Create a clothes hanger with a built-in AI-powered folding system that can automatically fold and organize clothes based on their type and size. This feature will save users time and effort, and also help maintain a neat and organized closet.

Clothes Cleaning and Drying: Develop a clothes hanger with a built-in cleaning and drying system. The hanger can be equipped with a small heating element and a microfiber cloth, which can clean and dry clothes as they hang. This feature will eliminate the need for a separate dryer and save users time and energy.

Smart Closet Organizer: Create a clothes hanger with a built-in AI-powered organizer that can group similar items together and suggest outfit combinations based on the user's preferences and lifestyle. This feature will help users create a more organized and stylish closet, and also provide personalized fashion recommendations.
